JEE (Main) (formerly AIEEE-All India Engineering Entrance Examination), NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test), BITSAT (Birla Institute of Technology & Science Admission Test) etc.

Mission:
1. To embrace the idea of inclusiveness along with academic excellence.
2. To achieve the aims and objectives, enhance success rate and provide utmost satisfaction to students/ their parents.
3. We are committed to instilling well-rounded academics rigour and imbuing the zeal for competition so that one’s course of action can lead one to reach the zenith of success meaningfully.

Vision:
1. We aim to become one of the most admired brands in education section and help the young aspirants to make their dreams come true through quality teaching, technology enabled systems & commitment.
2.
